description: I'm a passionate Front-end Engineer Developer with experience in the React ecosystem. My primary focus is on creating intuitive and captivating user interfaces that seamlessly blend functionality and design.
frontend: My expertise lies in front-end development, including building interactive components, managing application state, and optimizing performance in React-based projects. I use the latest practices and tools to ensure applications are efficient and scalable.
backend: While my primary focus is on front-end development, I also possess basic knowledge in backend development using Python. This allows me to collaborate effectively with full development teams and grasp the bigger picture of a project.
complement: I love staying up-to-date with the latest trends in web development and technology. I am committed to continuously learning and improving my skills to deliver exceptional solutions to technical challenges. I believe that collaboration and effective communication are crucial for success in any project.
descriptionChatGPT: This project is make in Next JS and typescript and use the Open AI api for we could send the questions and AI answer our questions
descriptionSK: As a Frontend engineer with outstanding skills, I provided expert guidance on the leading frameworks (Angular, React, Next.js) for scalable and maintainable projects at that company. Leveraging current best practices, I delivered innovative, high-quality solutions that drove the company's success. My collaboration contributed to increased productivity and code quality
descriptionDev: During my time as a web application developer at Devsavant, I had the opportunity to create custom solutions using React, Angular, and Node.js. My primary focus was on applying best programming practices to deliver scalable, efficient, and high-quality applications. These solutions significantly contributed to enhancing the company's online presence and profitability.
descriptionGlobant: During my internship at Globant, I gained experience in frontend development, as well as proficiency in MySQL, MongoDB, and network analysis tools like PyShark and Python. I applied this knowledge directly to company projects. My passion for learning and innovation drove me to deliver high-quality solutions.
